original_text: So Joshua agreed that they would not kill the people of Gibeon. The Israelite leaders also said that they would obey this agreement.
korean_text: 여호수아가 곧 그들과 화친하여 그들을 살리리라는 조약을 맺고 회중 족장들이 그들에게 맹세하였더라

sentences.original_text: that they would not kill the people of Gibeon
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 기브온 사람들을 죽이지 않을 것이라고

sentences.original_text: that they would obey this agreement
